sentences.sentence: I went aft to take my turn at the helm.

sentences.translation: 赫尔姆先生计划坚定地陈述该法案有违《第一修正案》。

sentences.sentence: After more than a decade at the helm of Colorado State University, Albert C Yates today announced his retirement.
sentences.translation: 在掌管科罗拉多州立大学10多年后，阿尔伯特·叶慈于今天宣布退休。
